greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of middle divisors of n.
comment: Divisors are in the half-open interval [sqrt(n/2), sqrt(n*2)).
link: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: if d^2 >= n/2 and d^2 < n*2 then
program: (PARI) a(n)=sumdiv(n,d, if(d^2>=n/2 && d^2<2*n, d, 0)) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 01 2016
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 27 2002
